snippet.title: Moons of Ardan - Gameplay Trailer | Early Access release
snippet.description:
Play Moons of Ardan on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694260/Moons_of_Ardan/

Moons of Ardan is a city-building and management game where you rebuild and expand your civilization across moons in a real-time simulated planetary system. 

You follow the Axonauts, the survivors of a generational ship that crashed on a lonely moon.
In the crash, most of the technology that served them got lost.

Help them restore their culture and reconnect with their homeworld by building a great wonder.

Join our rising community on Discord: https://discord.gg/gTeucz5bMf

Follow us on our media social channels:

Twitter -  https://twitter.com/MoonsOfArdan

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Moons%20of%20Ardan
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/moonsofardan/
Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/MoonsOfArdan/
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/MoonsOfArdan/
